types.html:
vergobreith m (plural vergobreiths)

  1. (history) alternative form of vergobret
    • 1882, Ernest Bosc, Histoire Nationale des Gaulois sus Vercingétorix‎[1] (quotation in French; overall work in French), Paris: Firmin-Didot et cie, page 286:
      Il prenait, nous disent les Commentaires, le titre de Vergobreith
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

title: vergobreith
pronunHtml:
• IPA(key): /vɛʁ.ɡɔ.bʁɛt/
  • Rhymes: -ɛt
  • Hyphenation: ver‧go‧bre‧ith
